channel.title: Posts on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: My First Post
item.description: hugo-Windows scoop 1 2 set-executionpolicy remotesigned -scope currentuser iex (new-object net.webclient).downloadstring('https://get.scoop.sh') hugo 1 scoop install hugo new blog 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 # 新建 hugo new site blog # 添加文章 hugo new post/my-first-post.md # 本地调式 hugo server -D # 生成静态页面 hugo -D
